alert.note: Alert for Schoharie; Western Albany; Western Greene; Western Ulster (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 22 at 4:34PM EST until December 23 at 12:00AM EST by NWS Albany
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT EST TONIGHT... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation. Additional snow accumulations of up to 4 inches and ice accumulations of a light glaze. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...In New York, Schoharie, Western Albany, Western Greene and Western Ulster Counties. * WHEN...Until midnight EST tonight. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions and reduced visibilities. The hazardous conditions will impact the evening commute. Strong winds could cause tree damage tonight. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow will continue through the evening. The snow is expected to gradually change to plain rain after midnight. Isolated pockets of freezing rain are possible this evening.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.

area.areaDesc: Schoharie; Western Albany; Western Greene; Western Ulster
